meanings.definition: A person who writes or compiles aphorisms.
meanings.sent1: The aphorists shared their wise sayings with the world.
meanings.sent2: Many famous aphorists have left a lasting impact on literature.
meanings.sent3: The group of aphorists at the library made everyone laugh with their clever quotes.
meanings.sent4: She was a true aphorist, distilling complex ideas into simple phrases.
meanings.sent5: The young aphorists in the writing club were full of creativity and insight.

meanings.sent1: The bookshelf was filled with books written by various aphorists.
meanings.sent2: The aphorists gathered at the conference to discuss their favorite quotes.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of aphorists, each sharing their favorite one-liners.
meanings.sent4: The room buzzed with the energy of the aphorists, each with a unique perspective.
meanings.sent5: The museum featured an exhibit dedicated to the works of famous aphorists.
